About Airport Pianos

# ðŸŽ¹ _airportpianos.org_ curates the location of pianos around the world. This site is ad-free and tracker-free. This project is run by [capjamesg](https://jamesg.blog). ## Contact I'd love your help to expand this project. Here are some ways you can contribute: - Tell me about an airport piano that isn't listed on this site; - Tell me about an airport piano that is listed on this site, but has been removed, or; - Donate a piano to your local airport! You can reach me at [readers [at] jamesg [dot] blog](mailto:readers@jamesg.blog).

Have information about a piano?

Add a piano, or submit an update, to this website.
